ISSUE.TITLE: flowable-bpmn-extensions.xsd wrongly assumes ServiceTask has resultVariable field
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the bug** [flowable-bpmn-extensions.xsd](https://github.com/flowable/flowable-engine/blob/flowable-6.5.0/modules/flowable-bpmn-converter/src/main/resources/org/flowable/impl/bpmn/parser/flowable-bpmn-extensions.xsd#L243) wrongly assumes BPMN `ServiceTask` has `resultVariable` field, but it instead has [resultVariableName](https://github.com/flowable/flowable-engine/blob/flowable-6.5.0/modules/flowable-bpmn-model/src/main/java/org/flowable/bpmn/model/ServiceTask.java#L61) field **Expected behavior** Think that `resultVariableName` field needs to be added to `flowable-bpmn-extensions.xsd` **Code** N/A **Additional context** Observed in Flowable 6.5.0

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Use waitForJobExecutorToProcessAllJobs instead of Thread.sleep in AsyncTaskTest

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Add resultVariableName to flowable-bpmn-extensions.xsd for use with ServiceTask (fixes #2285)
Add resultVariableName to flowable-bpmn-extensions.xsd for use with ServiceTask (fixes #2285) (#2309)
